name: Sandy's Sunday Bagel Brunch
shortDescription: Come by Illini Hillel for a bagel brunch to enjoy delicious bagels with friends.
location: Cohen Hillel, 503 E John St, Champaign

name: Quench
shortDescription: Join the Gender & Sexuality Resource Center for our Quench series as part of the Cultural & Resource Center Lunch on Us programming.
location: Women's Resource Center, 616 E. Green St. Suite 202, Champaign

name: Dish It Up
shortDescription: Join us for our Dish It Up/Lunch on Us Series at the Women's Resources Center while listening to speakers, lecturers, and panelists explore a variety of topics at the intersection of gender and other social identities.
location: Women's Resource Center, 616 E. Green St. Suite 202, Champaign

name: Jubilee Cafe
shortDescription: Jubilee Cafe offers freshly cooked, made from scratch meals and non-perishable pantry items to college students and community members who struggle with food insecurity.
location: Community United Church of Christ, 805 S 6th St, Champaign

name: Food for Thought
shortDescription: Food for Thought, a Lunch-on-Us series, is a weekly noontime discussion focused on topics relevant to the Asian American community. Past discussions include topics such as nutrition, mental health, sexual health, and media representation of Asian Americans.
location: Asian American Cultural Center, 1210 W Nevada St, Urbana

name: Food for the Soul
shortDescription: Food for the Soul, part of the Lunch on Us series, is a weekly noontime discussion focused on topics relevant to the many communities globally within the African Diaspora and our allies.
location: Bruce D. Nesbitt African American Cultural Center, 1212 W Nevada Street, Urbana

name: UniPlace Christian Church Community Dinner
shortDescription: Since 2012, UniPlace Christian Church has hosted a free community dinner for those in the Champaign-Urbana community.
location: University Place Christian Church, 403 S Wright St, Champaign

name: Lunch at La Casa
shortDescription: Lunch at La Casa is part of the Lunch on Us noontime discussion series. Lunch at La Casa takes place every Thursday during the academic year, and features interactive presentations focused in four areas: Campus Resources, Health and Wellness, College Living, and Community Connections.
location: La Casa Cultural Latina, 1205 Â½ West Nevada Street, Urbana

name: Friday Forum + Conversation Cafe
shortDescription: Join Diversity & Social Justice Education and the University YMCA for Friday Forum + Conversation Cafe! We will hear from community leaders tackling our most pressing public concerns through an unwavering pursuit of social justice.
location: University YMCA, 1001 S Wright St, Champaign

name: Shabbat Dinner at Hillel
shortDescription: End the week on a high note! Celebrate Shabbat at Hillel with a yummy free meal and great friends!
location: Cohen Hillel, 503 E John St, Champaign

name: Shabbat Dinner at Chabad
shortDescription: Turn an ordinary Friday night into a Shabbat Experience. Join fellow students for a five-course home cooked dinner in a warm atmosphere. New faces to meet, The Question of the Week, singing, stories and discussion throughout the night.
location: Chabad Center, 209 E Armory Ave, Champaign
